section.heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 105–34, title XI, § 1131(a), Aug. 5, 1997, 111 Stat. 978]

note.p: Section 1491, acts Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 365; Oct. 4, 1976, Pub. L. 94–455, title X, § 1015(a), 90 Stat. 1617; Nov. 6, 1978, Pub. L. 95–600, title VII, § 701(u)(14)(A), 92 Stat. 2919; Aug. 20, 1996, Pub. L. 104–188, title I, § 1907(b)(1), 110 Stat. 1916, imposed tax on transfers to avoid income tax.

Section 1492, acts Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 365; Jan. 12, 1971, Pub. L. 91–681, § 1(b), 84 Stat. 2066; Oct. 4, 1976, Pub. L. 94–455, title X, § 1015(b), title XIX, § 1906(b)(13)(A), 90 Stat. 1618, 1834; Nov. 6, 1978, Pub. L. 95–600, title VII, § 701(u)(14)(B), 92 Stat. 2919; July 18, 1984, Pub. L. 98–369, div. A, title I, § 131(f)(1), 98 Stat. 665, related to nontaxable transfers.

section.heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 89–809, title I, § 103(l)(2), Nov. 13, 1966, 80 Stat. 1554]

note.p: Section, act Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 365, defined foreign trust.

note.heading: Effective Date of Repeal
note.p: Repeal applicable with respect to taxable years beginning after Dec. 31, 1966, see section 103(n)(1) of Pub. L. 89–809, set out as an Effective Date of 1966 Amendment note under section 871 of this title.

section.heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 105–34, title XI, § 1131(a), Aug. 5, 1997, 111 Stat. 978]

note.p: Section, acts Aug. 16, 1954, ch. 736, 68A Stat. 365; Oct. 4, 1976, Pub. L. 94–455, title XIX, § 1906 (b)(13)(A), 90 Stat. 1834; July 18, 1984, Pub. L. 98–369, div. A, title I, § 131(f)(2), 98 Stat. 665; Aug. 20, 1996, Pub. L. 104–188, title I, § 1902(a), 110 Stat. 1909, provided for payment and collection of the tax imposed under section 1491 of this title.
